alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:05PM EST until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Presumpscot River At West Falmouth affecting Cumberland County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Strafford and Rockingham Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lamprey River near Newmarket. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Bennett Road in Durham starts to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 9.6 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
